section.title: 安装 microk8s
section.screen: root@kubernetes:~# snap install microk8s --classic --channel=latest/stable microk8s v1.21.3 from Canonical✓ installed

root@kubernetes:~# snap list Name Version Rev Tracking Publisher Notes core18 20210722 2128 latest/stable canonical✓ base lxd 4.0.7 21029 4.0/stable/… canonical✓ - microk8s v1.21.3 2346 latest/stable canonical✓ classic snapd 2.51.4 12883 latest/stable canonical✓ snapd
root@kubernetes:~# microk8s start Started.
snap disable microk8s # 禁用 snap enable microk8s # 启用
microk8s.reset snap remove microk8s
neo@ubuntu:~$ sudo apt install -y virtualbox

section.title: 组件管理
section.screen: root@kubernetes:~# microk8s enable ADDON -- --help Addon ADDON does not yet have a help message. For more information about it, visit https://microk8s.io/docs/addons
microk8s enable dashboard dns ingress istio registry storage
section.para: microk8s 只是最精简的安装，所以只有 api-server, controller-manager, scheduler, kubelet, cni, kube-proxy 被安装运行。额外的服务比如 kube-dns, dashboard 可以通过 microk8s.enable 启动
section.screen: dns dashboard storage ingress gpu istio registry metrics-server

section.title: dashboard
section.screen: microk8s enable dashboard

root@kubernetes:~# microk8s enable dashboard Enabling Kubernetes Dashboard Addon metrics-server is already enabled. Applying manifest serviceaccount/kubernetes-dashboard created service/kubernetes-dashboard created secret/kubernetes-dashboard-certs created secret/kubernetes-dashboard-csrf created secret/kubernetes-dashboard-key-holder created configmap/kubernetes-dashboard-settings created role.rbac.authorization.k8s.io/kubernetes-dashboard created clusterrole.rbac.authorization.k8s.io/kubernetes-dashboard created rolebinding.rbac.authorization.k8s.io/kubernetes-dashboard created clusterrolebinding.rbac.authorization.k8s.io/kubernetes-dashboard created deployment.apps/kubernetes-dashboard created service/dashboard-metrics-scraper created deployment.apps/dashboard-metrics-scraper created
If RBAC is not enabled access the dashboard using the default token retrieved with:
token=$(microk8s kubectl -n kube-system get secret | grep default-token | cut -d " " -f1) microk8s kubectl -n kube-system describe secret $token
In an RBAC enabled setup (microk8s enable RBAC) you need to create a user with restricted permissions as shown in: https://github.com/kubernetes/dashboard/blob/master/docs/user/access-control/creating-sample-user.md
microk8s dashboard-proxy

section.title: kubectl
section.para: 为了不和已经安装的 kubectl 产生冲突，microk8s 有自己的 microk8s.kubectl 命令
section.screen: microk8s.kubectl get services
section.para: 如果本地没有 kubectl 命令可以增加一个别名
section.screen: snap alias microk8s.kubectl kubectl
snap unalias kubectl
